page_content:
After discussing my professional goals with 
my leaders, they recommended the Ameris 
Leadership Development Program. I quickly 
found that the courses are extremely 
interactive and pushed me to open my 
mind and way of thinking. I am grateful that 
my leaders encouraged me to pursue this 
opportunity and am excited to start the 
next level of the program. 
– Shawna S.,  
    Retail Support Center Specialist LEADERSHIP 
DEVELOPMENT 
PROGRAM 
PARTICIPANT
2021 CSR REPORT | 11
